definition: rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity

traditional: 農村家庭聯產承包責任制
word: 农村家庭联产承包责任制

definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
fixing of farm output quotas for each household
to reform and open to the outside world/refers to Deng Xiaoping's policies from around 1980
collectivization of agriculture (disastrous policy of communist Russia around 1930 and China in the 1950s)
state monopoly of purchasing and marketing
